text: Ana hageno Ra Anumzamo'a Babiloni kini ne' Nebukatnesa huntegeno Jerusalemi kumate vahera ha' eme huzmanteno, kasefa nehazaveramina mono nompintira kazinteti nezmaheno, kasefa vahe'ene, vene omase mofanema, a'nenema, tavava ozafanena zamasunkura huozmante zamahe vagare'ne. Hagi Ra Anumzamo'a, Babiloni kini ne' Nebukatnesa azampi miko zamavare ante'ne.
